title: Patreon Picks #3
description:
To show what folks are missing out on if they're not Patreon members, we're featuring 6 stories on this episode that were previously part of our library of Bonus Content at Patreon.com/risk

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Mike O'Brien, Lindsay Hoffman, Emily Colburn, Tessa, Liz, Stella Harris, Kevin Allison, Freddy Morris, Casino Versus Japan, Steve Miller Band, Otis Redding)
